title: wheres the logic?
body: been at least a year or more now since OCE server has been up, League has grown so much with everything getting updates! Although i can not wait until 2016 the new Updates look wild, which brough to my attention. we are getting all this new cool updates but Riot still thinks we dont deserve 3v3..... wheres the logic in that?

replies.body: there is not enough players on to run 3v3 all the time. Its not that we dont deserve it.
what is their to run? just leave the game option avaliable
because no one has time to play the times they give us on the 2 days. if they bring it permantley alot more ppl will play. it doent cost them anything to run another game mode

Yeah it does. I'm not sure about the technicalities of it, but I'm pretty sure that if they open up another queue then there are running costs associated to that, which are paid off when people play it. Kinda like TV.
OCE wants  ARAM - Twisted Treeline - Dominion - Ultra Rapid Fire - One For All - Doom Bots - Hexakill - 50 minute que timers. what makes your 3v3 ranked so special. Where's your logic?
